duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and deliver data solutions and contribute to the development and implementation of IT business analytics plans.
Act as Lead Architect on major data programs and build and maintain strong relationships with business partners.
Provide deep hands-on experience in customer analytics, statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and management of the BI team.
Manage a team of BI professionals and be responsible for the development, growth, and performance of the team.
Participate in due diligence and evaluation of systems for M&A integration.
Participate in cross-organizational teams to develop solutions meeting the needs of SP&C.
Manage Data Warehouse help desk tickets and handle BI Analyst progress on reports.
Perform other duties as assigned and may require some travel.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in data analytics, data science, computer science, management information systems, finance, statistics, or related field required; MBA or post-graduate degree preferred.
Previous supervisory experience required; must be able to manage a technical team consisting of 5+ professionals.
